column4: i am running hardy, i would like to upgrade to jaunty... any tips?
do i just change my sources.list and do sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get distupgrade && sudo apt-get upgrade?
If you are happy with hardy, then stay with it. A direct upgrade from hardy to jaunty is not possible!
If you want to be up to date, wait until october an do a clean karmic koala 9.10 install.
